body.name: Pamo Babe Portable Crib for Baby, Portable Baby Playpen with Bassinet and Changing Table Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 45 mins
features: 【Easy To Assemble & Portable Travel Design】 Easy and quick to assemble and fold without any other tools. And it is equipped with carry bag and can be used as a travel crib for outdoor use.

【All-in-one Baby Playpen】 Pamo Babe Baby Playpen accompanies the growth of your baby. The design of the diaper table allows the mother to easily change diapers, and the comfortable playard provides a place for the baby to rest. In addition, the soft mattress offers comfortable lying experience(Suitable Mattress Pad's Size: L 36"x W 24").

【Lightweight & Durable Construction】The sturdy frame is made of iron tubes, which supports up to 33 lbs. Four round corners avoids bumping and scratching. The portable travel crib lightweight structure is easy to assemble. Take it with you in the car, on the train, or on the plane whenever you want to travel. Package dimension is L 27"x W 9"x H 9".

【Convenient & Flexible Babysitting】This portable baby playard comes with the lockable wheels for easy movement and stay still to be served as bedside bassinet. And it is equipped with mesh walls for adequate ventilation and easy babysitting.
【Safety & Skin-Friendly】 Our bed are made of breathable and skin-friendly fabrics, so babies can use them at ease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pamo Babe, it's decades professional manufacturing enterprise specializing in baby crib design, research and development. Our approach to caregiving systems from a heritage of innovation designed around safety, durability and the best intentions of loving parents.

Specification Product Weight: 25.6 Pounds Age/Weight Capacity: Birth to 3 Years Unfolded Dimensions: 39.4*27.6*27.6 inch Folded Dimensions: 28*14*10.23 inch Mattress Dimensions: 36.2*24.5 inch What's in the box: Infant Bassinet Toddler Playard Changing Table Foldable Mattress Portable Carry Bag Toy Bar with 3 Cute Toys

Multiple Ways to Use Infant Bassinet Infant bassinet including a mattress provides an easy-to-reach and easy-to-view spot for your baby to sleep.You can also add a softer pad for your baby to sleep in a softer sleep spot. Spacious Toddler Playard Remove the bassinet and diaper table to easily convert to a spacious toddler playard, creating a secure spot for your toddler to rest and play. Removable Changing Table The diaper table helps parent easily change diapers without arduously bending their backs. Convenient Carry Bag Stow the folded playard in the carry bag for convenient travel and storage.

How to Fold the Playard Step 1. After removing the changing table, pull up on the loop located at the center of the play yard. Step 2. Grasp the connecting of long rail and feel or the locking mechanism underneath the joint.Squeeze and release the locking mechanism and push downward. Step 3. Unlock the short rail as step 2. Step 4. Move railings toward center and Wrap the travel cot tightly with the mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome pack and play, especially for the price point! My son sleeps in his right now while were still room sharing, and we needed another for my parents house. Easy to put together, sturdy, and it looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it but directions really need some work
reviews.reviewText: This product is really sturdy and I am sure my son and his wife will get a lot of use out of it. On the down side, the directions were terrible. It took at least 1 hour to assemble. It kept saying use the tube but... which one?????? I finally put the directions down and just figured it out. On a great note... it only took about 2 minutes to pack up. Not eveything packs into the one bag as far as I can tell. Might need some more work on figuring that one out. But I am really happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Play Pen for our partially paralyzed small dog
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this for our little dog since she is partially paralyzed and needs a safe space. The drs said we should put her down, but our little girl was so alert and happy, and we felt the drs were wrong. We bought this pack and play for her so she could move around and be herself for as long as she has left. This is a sturdy "play pen" and she can see us and the other dogs through the mesh sides. The pad is very nice and well-padded. We use bed pads (for wetting) and she is also in diapers. So, just like a baby, we can keep tabs on her. The bassinette, the upper position, is very nice. But since our little dog likes to sit up to see us and then falls over, we keep her in the bottom "play pen" so she will be safe. I just wish this had an adjustable place so the play pen area could be placed in a higher position to save the bending to care for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: First Grandchild worthy :)Love the wheels so I can put away and take out when needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's beautiful, love the color Grey and it is perfect to move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was worried but when I recieved it, it is just as I hoped it would be base on the description onsite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was a gift.
reviews.reviewText: This was a baby gift to our granddaughter for her first child. She loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up, travels well.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this to take place of the bassinet in our bedroom because she grew out of it. We took it to the beach with us, it’s very easy to pack up and travel with. We did end up buying a pack and play mattress to go in it, could probably be used without the mattress but it is pretty firm without one.
